price: Ɛmma wͻn a wͻyi (Nyankopͻn Asεm no ho) boniayε no adwen nyε wͻn sε wͻbɛtumi asan (Yεn ho), nokorε sε wͻntumi mma (Nyankopͻn nhyehyεε) nyε kwa.
arabic: وَلَا يَحۡسَبَنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ سَبَقُوٓاْۚ إِنَّهُمۡ لَا يُعۡجِزُونَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: walā yaḥsabanna alladhīna kafarū sabaqū innahum lā yuʿ'jizūna
